name: Cosmic Shepherd
description:
In Cosmic Shepherd, you take control of a daring space pilot to try and save the galaxy from itself. The stars  are shrinking away, and they'll soon disappear completely unless they receive more mass in the form of asteroids. Use your ship to mine, maneuver, and launch different kinds of asteroids into the stars without destroying the planets that orbit them.

Note: Game viewed best in fullscreen!

Controls

WASD: Ship movement
Mouse: Ship orientation
Left Click (Hold): Fire mining laser
Mouse Wheel: Cycle asteroid selectionRight Click (Hold): Aim selected asteroid
Right Click (Release): Launch selected asteroid
E: Transform asteroid into turret. Shoot turret asteroids at planets so they can defend themselves!
